attributes.action: Leave the EU, ignore other petition
attributes.additional_details:
Stop the petition for another Referendum.
Stop MP’s from sabotaging Brexit by delaying and voting against everything to do with Brexit.
MPs who’s constituents voted Leave should do as their constituent voted. Not their own or parties interest first.
attributes.background:
The UK had the biggest turn out in votes for Brexit and the people voted leave.
This is supposed to be a democracy where once a vote is taken you shouldn’t have another vote because you don’t agree with it.
